title: University Teaching in Japan! - Tokyo, Kanagawa, Chiba, Saitama, and Aichi

description.title: University Teaching in Japan! - Tokyo, Kanagawa, Chiba, Saitama, and Aichi
description.details:
We are now recruiting instructors for the Spring 2017 term.
About Westgate:
We have been providing conversation-based practical English lessons since 1983 and hire over 320 instructors every year.
Westgate is a major force in shaping the future of Japanese education.
We are a gateway to career development for highly motivated professional English instructors around the world.
Find out more about Westgate and apply at http://www.westgate.co.jp/application/ !
**** ATTENTION ****
We are also looking for candidates with the following background and experience:
- Master's degree or higher
- Total 3 years or more (or at least 6 or more terms/semesters) experience in teaching university/community college (all subjects).
***** UNIVERSITY PROGRAM (FULL-TIME) *****
1) PROGRAM INFORMATION:
We are seeking highly motivated educators to teach at a Japanese university. This unique opportunity is for bright teachers eager to enrich their teaching skills while realizing the dream of exploring a foreign country.
2) QUALIFICATIONS:
- Native speaker of English with a passport from one of the following English-speaking countries; USA, the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, Ireland, or New Zealand.
- University graduate with a bachelor's and/or more advanced degree and one of the following:
a) actual EFL/ESL classroom teaching experience along with EFL/ESL teaching certificate and/or elementary/primary/secondary teaching credentials/qualifications
b) 1000+ hours of actual EFL/ESL classroom teaching experience in lieu of teaching certificates or credentials/qualifications
* No Japanese language ability is required.
3) CONTRACT PERIOD:
- SPRING TERM -- April / May to July (approx. 3 to 4 months)
- FALL TERM -- September to December / January (approx. 3 to 5 months)
4) LOCATION:
Tokyo, Kanagawa, Chiba, Saitama, and Aichi
5) COMPENSATION:
- 260,000 yen per month for those with less than 499 hours of actual classroom teaching experience and a teaching certificate or credentials/qualifications
- 275,000 yen per month or more for those with 500+ hours of actual classroom teaching experience and a teaching certificate or credentials/qualifications, or 1000+ hours of actual classroom teaching experience in lieu of teaching certificates or credentials/qualifications
6) OTHER:
- HOUSING is provided. We will arrange a furnished single apartment with a rental fee of 81,000 yen per month (utilities and maintenance fees included).
- FLIGHT REIMBURSEMENT in an amount of up to 1200 USD is offered for those coming from overseas.
- WORKING VISA SPONSORSHIP is available.
- RENEWABLE contract.
***** HOW TO APPLY *****
Please visit our website and fill out the online application form. There you will find more program information and any conditions that apply. Although it takes a few moments to complete the application form, you will find it worthwhile. Entering your information into our database streamlines the application process: http://www.westgate.co.jp/application/

description.details: Work at English First. Travel and teach in China.          Looking for an exciting change in 2017? Take your teaching journey to Indonesia with English First. New positions available now.           APPLY NOW TO LEARN MORE                               WE�RE HIRING                                                                                             THE OPPORTUNITY          New limited vacancies for 2017 teaching positions are now available. EF English First is currently seeking teachers to teach English in Indonesia to Kids & Teens or Adults. Join our academic team in cities across Indonesia.           ABOUT THE POSITION          As an English teacher for EF English First, you will be planning and delivering lessons using EF's award-winning ESL courseware, evaluating student progress and providing ongoing guidance for improvement. This is an incredible opportunity for someone looking to further their career in teaching and meet others passionate about education while experiencing an exciting life abroad.           TEACHER SUPPORT AND RESOURCES          Teachers are offered the opportunity to participate in company-organized trainings throughout the year as well as networking and social events. Teachers also have full access to Internet-connected computers, Touchscreen TVs, Interactive Whiteboards and iPads.           MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES          Plan and deliver lessons to classesUse electronic media and EF's award-winning ESL courseware to teach English efficiently and effectivelyEvaluate student progress and providing ongoing guidance for improvement           QUALIFICATIONS          A Bachelor's DegreeA TEFL CertificationMust be able to obtain a clear background checkThe ability to live abroad for at least one year           ADDITIONAL REQUIREMENTS          To be considered for this role, applicants must be passport holders from USA, UK, Canada, Australia or New Zealand.           EMPLOYMENT PACKAGE          11,000,000 - 14,000,000 IDR monthly after taxes, based on locationApproved flight ticket reimbursedHousing provided in many locationsSponsored legal KITAS work visaHealth insuranceMinimum 10 paid annual leave days plus 18 national holidaysAirport pick-up upon arrival           ABOUT EF ENGLISH FIRST          EF English First is the world's leading privately owned education company. Founded in 1965, EF operates in over 50 countries around the world. We have vacancies for ESL jobs in Indonesia so if you prefer the fast paced city life of Jakarta, or want to be immersed in the more traditional culture of a smaller city, we probably have the position for you. We have both Kids & Teens schools and Adult schools in over 20 cities in Indonesia.                     Ready to join our team in 2017 andtake the next step in your teaching career? title: University Teaching in Japan! - Tokyo, Kanagawa, Chiba, Saitama, and Aichi

description.title: University Teaching in Japan! - Tokyo, Kanagawa, Chiba, Saitama, and Aichi
description.details:
We are now recruiting instructors for the Spring 2017 term.
About Westgate:
We have been providing conversation-based practical English lessons since 1983 and hire over 320 instructors every year.
Westgate is a major force in shaping the future of Japanese education.
We are a gateway to career development for highly motivated professional English instructors around the world.
Find out more about Westgate and apply at http://www.westgate.co.jp/application/ !
**** ATTENTION ****
We are also looking for candidates with the following background and experience:
- Master's degree or higher
- Total 3 years or more (or at least 6 or more terms/semesters) experience in teaching university/community college (all subjects).
***** UNIVERSITY PROGRAM (FULL-TIME) *****
1) PROGRAM INFORMATION:
We are seeking highly motivated educators to teach at a Japanese university. This unique opportunity is for bright teachers eager to enrich their teaching skills while realizing the dream of exploring a foreign country.
2) QUALIFICATIONS:
- Native speaker of English with a passport from one of the following English-speaking countries; USA, the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, Ireland, or New Zealand.
- University graduate with a bachelor's and/or more advanced degree and one of the following:
a) actual EFL/ESL classroom teaching experience along with EFL/ESL teaching certificate and/or elementary/primary/secondary teaching credentials/qualifications
b) 1000+ hours of actual EFL/ESL classroom teaching experience in lieu of teaching certificates or credentials/qualifications
* No Japanese language ability is required.
3) CONTRACT PERIOD:
- SPRING TERM -- April / May to July (approx. 3 to 4 months)
- FALL TERM -- September to December / January (approx. 3 to 5 months)
4) LOCATION:
Tokyo, Kanagawa, Chiba, Saitama, and Aichi
5) COMPENSATION:
- 260,000 yen per month for those with less than 499 hours of actual classroom teaching experience and a teaching certificate or credentials/qualifications
- 275,000 yen per month or more for those with 500+ hours of actual classroom teaching experience and a teaching certificate or credentials/qualifications, or 1000+ hours of actual classroom teaching experience in lieu of teaching certificates or credentials/qualifications
6) OTHER:
- HOUSING is provided. We will arrange a furnished single apartment with a rental fee of 81,000 yen per month (utilities and maintenance fees included).
- FLIGHT REIMBURSEMENT in an amount of up to 1200 USD is offered for those coming from overseas.
- WORKING VISA SPONSORSHIP is available.
- RENEWABLE contract.
***** HOW TO APPLY *****
Please visit our website and fill out the online application form. There you will find more program information and any conditions that apply. Although it takes a few moments to complete the application form, you will find it worthwhile. Entering your information into our database streamlines the application process: http://www.westgate.co.jp/application/

title: English Teacher Needed in Concepcion, Chile

description.title: English Teacher Needed in Concepcion, Chile
description.details: Thomas Jefferson School, a private bilingual PK-12 school, located in Concepcion, Chile is looking for an oral English teacher. The successful candidate will work under the supervision of fully qualified English teacher in grades 1to 6. The School�s English program dedicates one hour per week to oral English instruction and practice. The successful candidate must be a native speaker of American English have completed at least three years of university studies. ESL or teacher training is desired but not required however a love for children and an outgoing personality is essential. Basic Spanish is helpful for out-off-school life but is not required. Preparation for the 2017 school year begins mid February and instructional responsibilities for this position close mid December 2017. Salary and benefits include basic health insurance, Chilean retirement, full airfare reimbursement upon completion of the contract, and free housing except for utilities. A take home salary of $1000.00/m for 12 months. This is salary is typical for a Chilean teacher.

title: University Teaching in Japan! - Tokyo, Kanagawa, Chiba, Saitama, and Aichi

description.title: University Teaching in Japan! - Tokyo, Kanagawa, Chiba, Saitama, and Aichi
description.details:
We are now recruiting instructors for the Spring 2017 term.
About Westgate:
We have been providing conversation-based practical English lessons since 1983 and hire over 320 instructors every year.
Westgate is a major force in shaping the future of Japanese education.
We are a gateway to career development for highly motivated professional English instructors around the world.
Find out more about Westgate and apply at http://www.westgate.co.jp/application/ !
**** ATTENTION ****
We are also looking for candidates with the following background and experience:
- Master's degree or higher
- Total 3 years or more (or at least 6 or more terms/semesters) experience in teaching university/community college (all subjects).
***** UNIVERSITY PROGRAM (FULL-TIME) *****
1) PROGRAM INFORMATION:
We are seeking highly motivated educators to teach at a Japanese university. This unique opportunity is for bright teachers eager to enrich their teaching skills while realizing the dream of exploring a foreign country.
2) QUALIFICATIONS:
- Native speaker of English with a passport from one of the following English-speaking countries; USA, the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, Ireland, or New Zealand.
- University graduate with a bachelor's and/or more advanced degree and one of the following:
a) actual EFL/ESL classroom teaching experience along with EFL/ESL teaching certificate and/or elementary/primary/secondary teaching credentials/qualifications
b) 1000+ hours of actual EFL/ESL classroom teaching experience in lieu of teaching certificates or credentials/qualifications
* No Japanese language ability is required.
3) CONTRACT PERIOD:
- SPRING TERM -- April / May to July (approx. 3 to 4 months)
- FALL TERM -- September to December / January (approx. 3 to 5 months)
4) LOCATION:
Tokyo, Kanagawa, Chiba, Saitama, and Aichi
5) COMPENSATION:
- 260,000 yen per month for those with less than 499 hours of actual classroom teaching experience and a teaching certificate or credentials/qualifications
- 275,000 yen per month or more for those with 500+ hours of actual classroom teaching experience and a teaching certificate or credentials/qualifications, or 1000+ hours of actual classroom teaching experience in lieu of teaching certificates or credentials/qualifications
6) OTHER:
- HOUSING is provided. We will arrange a furnished single apartment with a rental fee of 81,000 yen per month (utilities and maintenance fees included).
- FLIGHT REIMBURSEMENT in an amount of up to 1200 USD is offered for those coming from overseas.
- WORKING VISA SPONSORSHIP is available.
- RENEWABLE contract.
***** HOW TO APPLY *****
Please visit our website and fill out the online application form. There you will find more program information and any conditions that apply. Although it takes a few moments to complete the application form, you will find it worthwhile. Entering your information into our database streamlines the application process: http://www.westgate.co.jp/application/

title: FREE HOUSING! Experienced and non-experienced teachers welcome in Shihu Town, Changhua County, Taiwan

description.title: FREE HOUSING! Experienced and non-experienced teachers welcome in Shihu Town, Changhua County, Taiwan
description.details:
Pay will be at least NTD 55,000 per month. We are a branch of Joy English, our branch has won many awards, and we are trusted by and praised by parents. Teachung hours are 4:40 to 9 or 9:30 Monday to Friday, and 10 to 3 on Saturdays. You may request one Saturday off a month, or another day if you prefer. Office hours begin at 3 pm so you have time to prepare for classes and grade homework. Joy provides a full curriculum and teaching plan. The co-workers are nice and the working environment is a good one. Shihu is a great place to save money. We say this is a town in the countryside, but it is more like a small city with farms nearby. Eveything you might need you can find in town, unless you want exciting nightlife or many Western style restaurants. These can be found in Tauchung City (a forty minute bus-ride away). Shihu is close to Lukang Historic area and Sun Moon Lake, both very popular travel destinations. You will share the 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom high-rise apartment with another foreign teacher. It comes fully furnished and with all bedding and appliances. The only costs for you are water and electricity, but this is very little compared to Western countries. Upon request, we will provide you with the email for our foreign teacher of three years, as well as pictures of the apartment. What do WE want? We want energetic, fun teachers our students can love! We hope to hear from you!
Let us know when you can fly to Taiwan and start working.
Please contact Jully by email: jully8850300@gmail.com
or Nina by email : e1214n@yahoo.com.tw

title: University Teaching in Japan! - Tokyo, Kanagawa, Chiba, Saitama, and Aichi

description.title: University Teaching in Japan! - Tokyo, Kanagawa, Chiba, Saitama, and Aichi
description.details:
We are now recruiting instructors for the Spring 2017 term.
About Westgate:
We have been providing conversation-based practical English lessons since 1983 and hire over 320 instructors every year.
Westgate is a major force in shaping the future of Japanese education.
We are a gateway to career development for highly motivated professional English instructors around the world.
Find out more about Westgate and apply at http://www.westgate.co.jp/application/ !
**** ATTENTION ****
We are also looking for candidates with the following background and experience:
- Master's degree or higher
- Total 3 years or more (or at least 6 or more terms/semesters) experience in teaching university/community college (all subjects).
***** UNIVERSITY PROGRAM (FULL-TIME) *****
1) PROGRAM INFORMATION:
We are seeking highly motivated educators to teach at a Japanese university. This unique opportunity is for bright teachers eager to enrich their teaching skills while realizing the dream of exploring a foreign country.
2) QUALIFICATIONS:
- Native speaker of English with a passport from one of the following English-speaking countries; USA, the United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, Ireland, or New Zealand.
- University graduate with a bachelor's and/or more advanced degree and one of the following:
a) actual EFL/ESL classroom teaching experience along with EFL/ESL teaching certificate and/or elementary/primary/secondary teaching credentials/qualifications
b) 1000+ hours of actual EFL/ESL classroom teaching experience in lieu of teaching certificates or credentials/qualifications
* No Japanese language ability is required.
3) CONTRACT PERIOD:
- SPRING TERM -- April / May to July (approx. 3 to 4 months)
- FALL TERM -- September to December / January (approx. 3 to 5 months)
4) LOCATION:
Tokyo, Kanagawa, Chiba, Saitama, and Aichi
5) COMPENSATION:
- 260,000 yen per month for those with less than 499 hours of actual classroom teaching experience and a teaching certificate or credentials/qualifications
- 275,000 yen per month or more for those with 500+ hours of actual classroom teaching experience and a teaching certificate or credentials/qualifications, or 1000+ hours of actual classroom teaching experience in lieu of teaching certificates or credentials/qualifications
6) OTHER:
- HOUSING is provided. We will arrange a furnished single apartment with a rental fee of 81,000 yen per month (utilities and maintenance fees included).
- FLIGHT REIMBURSEMENT in an amount of up to 1200 USD is offered for those coming from overseas.
- WORKING VISA SPONSORSHIP is available.
- RENEWABLE contract.
***** HOW TO APPLY *****
Please visit our website and fill out the online application form. There you will find more program information and any conditions that apply. Although it takes a few moments to complete the application form, you will find it worthwhile. Entering your information into our database streamlines the application process: http://www.westgate.co.jp/application/

title: Teach in Taiwan!

description.title: Teach in Taiwan!
description.details:
Gloria English School is looking for enthusiastic and responsible native English speakers to work with us.
Here is some basic information regarding our schools:
Why Gloria?
Gloria English School is one of the largest and most reputable English schools in Taiwan, with over 13,000 students, approximately 600 staff members, and 18 branches throughout Taoyuan City. Established in 1978, Gloria has been a leader in the private education industry for over 30 years. We have a fully developed curriculum that integrates games, songs, current events, drama, and gestures. At Gloria English School, learning is fun!
Gloria offers a competitive salary, a one-year bonus of NT$30,000 and a contract renewal bonus of NT$30,000 in addition to performance and holiday bonuses, free accommodation, health and dental insurance, and assistance with work permit and ARC application. In addition, the Gloria community is very close-knit! The professional, yet casual and friendly environment at Gloria guarantees that you will have both a fantastic teaching career as well as an exciting lifestyle in Taiwan. For more information, please visit www.glo.com.tw or our facebook page.
What Gloria Offers:
1. NT$660 per hour (starting rate with attendance bonus) � approx. NT$55,000/month after tax.
2. Job security through guaranteed hours (a minimum average of 20 hours per week)
3. One-year bonus of NT$30,000 (approx. $ 1000 USD)
4. Paid leaves when accumulating one year seniority.
5. Free housing for 15 months (single rooms with shared living room, kitchen, and bathrooms)
6. Health and dental insurance
7. Assistance with work permit and ARC application
8. Additional bonuses (attendance, student re-enrolment, holiday ...etc.)
9. Fully developed curriculum with teaching materials
10. Extensive training program
11. Airport pick-up
Please submit your resume, a copy of your diploma, and a copy of your passport
(biographical page) to Celia Chou ( Recruiting Manager) at ges.job.tw@gmail.com

description.details:
JOB OVERVIEW: Our client requires certified English Teachers for an attractive 2-year opportunity (renewable) in the highly respected and recognized Government Program to teach in public schools (grades 8-12) in the UAE. Pre-approved candidates will be invited to attend a mandatory in-person interview hosted by the client. The in-person interviews will take place at the following locations and dates: Toronto (Canada) on December 3rd and 4th; London (UK) on December 17th; Manchester (UK) on December 18th; Atlanta (USA) on January 21st and 22nd; London (UK) on February 4th and 5th; and New York (USA) on February 18th and 19th. Positions start as early as January 2017.
HOW TO APPLY: Go Here for More Info and to Apply: http://www.itsacademic.ca/job-listings/12036/
WORLD REGION: Middle East
COUNTRY: UAE
CITY: Multiple
JOB TYPE: Teaching/Faculty Jobs
ORGANIZATION TYPE : K-12 School
START DATE: 09/01/17
CONTRACT LENGTH: 2 Year Contract
BENEFITS: English Teachers will be paid 21,000 Dirhams per month which is equivalent to US$5700 Tax Free. This total amount includes an accommodation subsidy. There are summer vacation and national holidays amounting to 42 days annual leave. The employer will provide medical insurance for self and eligible family members, mobilization costs (for staff locating from another country), end of service benefits, and repatriation back to your home country (for eligible employees). QUALIFICATIONS: A Bachelor's degree in English, or a B.Ed with a teachable subject in English; a TESL/TEFL/TESOL/CELTA certificate; a MA in Applied Linguistics or MA TESL would be highly valued as an asset. Experience should include a minimum of 3 years teaching experience in the EFL/ESL field (with experience of competency-based and interactive learning strategies); Evidence of continual professional development and a proactive approach to career progression; some experience with teacher support and/or curriculum and assessment development planning. US, Canadian and UK passport holders. Teachers must be 52 years of age or under as per visa regulations in the UAE.

The employer will provide medical insurance for self and eligible family members, mobilization costs (for staff locating from another country), end of service benefits, and repatriation back to your home country (for eligible employees). The employer values their staff, and they believe that together they can make a difference in the lives of their students and within the community.
QUALIFICATIONS: A Bachelor's degree in Business, or a B.Ed with a teachable subject in Business; a TESL/TEFL/TESOL certificate; a Master's Degree would be highly valued as an asset. Experience should include a minimum of 3 years teaching experience (with experience of competency-based and interactive learning strategies); Evidence of continual professional development and a proactive approach to career progression; some experience with teacher support and/or curriculum and assessment development planning. US, Canadian and UK passport holders. Teachers must be 52 years of age or under as per visa regulations in the UAE.
JOB DETAILS: Business Teachers are the first point of contact for students, and it is their responsibility for maintaining effective communication channels between the teaching staff and management. They must also ensure implementation of the curriculum and assessment strategy in a trainee-centered manner in the respected government program; and to provide the delivery of professional development programmes to support school-wide reform. Business Teachers are supported by a Zone Specialist with each member contributing to the continuous improvement of teaching and learning materials. Business Teachers may work with other discipline specialists in a technology-enabled environment to coordinate assignments and projects.
HOW TO APPLY: Go Here for More Info and to Apply: http://www.itsacademic.ca/job-listings/12039/
SCHOOL OVERVIEW: The respected Government Program has a network of K-12 schools across Dubai, Sharjah and Northern Emirates. They comprise of Male and Female Campuses. The client has been mandated to bring onboard 400+ teachers. New teachers will enhance and develop the student learning experience and bring onboard western teaching methods and practices.
WHO WE ARE: It's Academic Educational Staffing is a Canadian organization that specializes in helping talented and qualified teachers and administrators find great jobs at the best schools in Canada and overseas. Visit our web site for more info or to join our community at www.itsacademic.ca
